00001 #include "FreeImage.h"
00002 #include "FreeImageAlgorithms_Colour.h"
00003 
00004 #include "CuTest.h"
00005 
00006 
00007 static void
00008 TestFreeImageAlgorithms_ColourFunctions(CuTest* tc)
00009 {
00010         unsigned char red = 165, green = 202, blue = 68;
00011         double hue, satuation, value;
00012 
00013         FreeImageAlgorithms_RGBToHSV(red, green, blue, &hue, &satuation, &value);
00014 
00015         CuAssertTrue(tc, (int)(hue + 0.5) == 77);
00016         CuAssertTrue(tc, (int)(satuation * 100 + 0.5) == 66);
00017         CuAssertTrue(tc, (int)(value * 100 + 0.5) == 79);
00018 
00019         FreeImageAlgorithms_HSVToRGB(hue, satuation, value, &red, &green, &blue);
00020 
00021         CuAssertTrue(tc, red == 165);
00022         CuAssertTrue(tc, green == 202);
00023         CuAssertTrue(tc, blue == 68);
00024 }
00025 
00026 
00027 CuSuite* DLL_CALLCONV
00028 CuGetFreeImageAlgorithmsColourSuite(void)
00029 {
00030         CuSuite* suite = CuSuiteNew();
00031 
00032         SUITE_ADD_TEST(suite, TestFreeImageAlgorithms_ColourFunctions);
00033 
00034         return suite;
00035 }
